description:
Population Raster Tonga 2020

Data Input: Household locations from 2016 Population and Housing Census conducted using Survey Solutions CAPI (Computer Assisted Personal Interview). 
Year Population Growth Rate of -0.244 % has been applied to update population up to 2020

HH locations vector layer has been transformed into a 100m resolution raster.

Household locations vector layer has been transformed into a 100m resolution raster.
name: Tonga_Population_Grid_2020
